#summary a list of threat intelligence tools

= Introduction =

A page to highlight and record tools in the threat intelligence space

 * [http://abusehelper.be AbuseHelper] - Automatically process your incident notifications
 * [http://collectiveintel.org CIF] - Collective Intelligence Framework
 * [https://github.com/MISP/MISP MISP] - Malware Information Sharing Platform
 * [https://csirt.cesnet.cz/Warden/Intro WARDEN] - a system for efficient sharing information about detected events (threats).
